Riot has made a great hud but in my view to advance for low elo / start players

It really isn't; how is it advanced for new or low elo/new players? For one, for new players it would be what they start with, so they'd get used to it much faster than current players, and second, it impacts low elo players exactly the same as any other elo player: we all have got to get used to the change.

Personally, I can't say I like or dislike it, I've played two Arams with it and still have got some getting used to, but I think it's going to be a great change. Everything you need is in the one place (as they have explained) that you SHOULD be looking constantly: the minimap. They removed some cramming with feedback by putting time and latency/fps back to the top right side of the screen.

hey guys,

Have you by any chance seen this post a while back? http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/game-features/hud-update

It goes through why we have decided to position everything the way we have. Would love to hear your feedback after you have gone through this
so, is there going to be an option to change back to the old HUD?

Telling us WHY you changed it doesn't change the fact that people don't like it, 

I'm a graphic designer and i know that clustering so much information together doesn't aid in readability it hinders it, and you shouldn't change such key positions of info, like the KDA and CS, our eyes are so tuned by now to read the top right corner to keep track of our CS that moving that just makes it confusing, in a book shop, you wouldn't suddenly put the barcode from the back of the book onto page 52 instead, because that just causes unnecessary confusion, 

also and this must have been an oversight in development but after an ability just finishes its cooldown it changes for a half second into a light blue colour, which just so happens to be almost exactly the same as the 'you cant cast this ability because you're out of mana' colour in the old HUD, this is so confusing, you're mid fight and your eye is flitting down to the cool downs of your abilities waiting for say Q to be ready, you look down and it just goes off cooldown and it appears as the oom colour and your mind goes 'ok i cant use that' and it screws your whole timing up. 

it would be great to have an option to change between HUDs, it wont affect anything because you're the only one who can see it, and so what if some people have slightly less room on their screen, thats their choice and should be allowed to do that if they want.

now I'm not afraid of change so this isn't a "ohhh everythings different, hissssss, begone!" post i was and am one of the die hard supporters of the new summoners rift and VU's because i think they are graphically much better, but this HUD update is for lack of a better word a menace. 
it even hurts the eyes because of the constant tone.

1. Can we have the tab of Champion info able to be permanently opened for other stats like spell pen % etc?

2. I disliked that the Champion tabs were at the bottom right because I liked being able to click Champ picture on the left in cluster fights with Kayle ultimate so I can be sure I don't mislick someone, or so I can ulti a Teemo when he's under cho'gath because it's otherwise impossible and I don't think that Champ models interfering with spell casts should be a factor, I mean we can still click cast the Champ picture so it was in my opinion better on the left because it's 5x as easy to click for things like this and raka heals etc.

3. The spells look like they are unavailable (out of mana) for a brief moment when they come off cooldown so sometimes you can't see in peripheral if you have mana for a spell, I think it should be Outlined in Red in cooldowns you're out of mana for that spell and flash blue when its off cooldown so you know, (like it does) and the Red outline should flash blue when it becomes available and if it's coming off cooldown and becomes available should flash blue (whole pic).

4. Levelling up a spell should be colored not greyed out... (IMO).

5. The tabs look cool, the map looks cool and I like the coloring, textures and cooldown feature.

Just a few ideas anyway.

Edit: Oh, the Champion stats tab is really unclear though, have to remember stats position to be able to check them quick, could be better icons or maybe bigger or something. Maybe like Red for offense section with better pics (bigger) and Blue for AP section etc.

Edit2: Also where is the EXP tab?
Are you asking where to see how much experience you need to level up? It curves around your champion picture on the right, going bottom to top I believe.

Its fine... unless you have trouble seeing/wear glasses or contacts. 
Parts of the HUD are tiny and the color contrast is not very strong in some places. This is leading to those with visual impairments struggling to see necessary parts (cs, kda, allied ult portraits and activatable items). From what I have heard and experienced, is that people with these kind of impairments are getting the headaches associated with eye strain a lot more easily and frequently than usual with the new HUD update.

After playing a few games on the new hud, i find that the design and colouring amplifies the darker side of the overall map and aplies a much darker mood to the overall feel of the map and generally feels depressing. Where as the older hud amplified the more rocky and magical side of sum rift and gave the map a more adventurous feel rather than depressing.
